qas.question: What do i have to complete if i don't have documents?

answers.text: must complete an online epidemiological form that declares information about your state of health

qas.question: What must you confirm if you don't have a listed document?

answers.text: confirm that you will self-isolate for 14 days unless you are exempt.

paragraphs.context: From 17 January 2022, on entering Moldova, all arrivals who don’t have one of the documents listed below, must complete an online epidemiological form that declares information about your state of health (relevant to COVID-19) and confirm that you will self-isolate for 14 days unless you are exempt.

qas.question: If i'm in isolation when do i take a test ?

answers.text: on the 7th day of their visit

qas.question: If the test result is negative, what happens?

answers.text: will not have to continue self-isolating

qas.question: With a negative pcr test where can i enter?

paragraphs.context: Arrivals who are in self-isolation may take a PCR test or a rapid antigen test on the 7th day of their visit, and will not have to continue self-isolating if the test is negative. You are allowed to enter the Transnistrian region without a negative PCR test.

qas.question: What makes you exempt from self-isolation?

answers.text: you present proof that you have received both doses of an approved vaccination

qas.question: When must the second dose have been administered for the exemption to be valid ?

answers.text: at least 14 days before your date of arrival

paragraphs.context: You will be exempt from self-isolation if you present proof that you have received both doses of an approved vaccination. The second dose must have been administered at least 14 days before your date of arrival. Current rules do not specify whether electronic documents are acceptable as proof, but you are recommended to present your vaccination certificate in paper form.

answers.text: entering Moldova without any COVID documentation
vaccination certificate, negative PCR test, lateral flow test or similar

paragraphs.context: IMPORTANT: It is strongly advised against entering Moldova without any COVID documentation (e.g. vaccination certificate, negative PCR test, lateral flow test or similar).
